tag_list: writer, journalist, technical, it, education, electronic, electrical, diy, wiring, plumbing, computers, computing
overview:
Phil Thane is a freelance writer specialising in technical subjects. He writes regularly for several UK based computer magazines including Micro Mart and PC Utilities, and for websites including Linux Forums and Linux.com, for oil industry trade magazines Biofuels International and Tank Storage Magazine and for DIY titles including GoodWoodworking and SelfBuild.

An ex-teacher Phil has also written for the Times Educational Supplement, Electronics Education and Teach!

Phil has recently written a DIY Wiring book for GMC (due out Jan 2009) and is working on DIY Plumbing.
